name: Lost Scale: Part One
description:
Lost Scale: Part One is a top-down shooter game made in 2D graphics.
This is a hardcore, bloody top-down shooter in which you have to overcome crowds of opponents and hold out for a certain time, which will help you with the loot that appears.

Scene:

Once, on a warm evening, the reptile Rappie was walking with her pet Stripe. Suddenly a disaster struck: the pet fell underground into the Deadshell caves. Find Stripe, get out of trouble and solve the riddle of a new world dominated by humanoid reptiles.
